title: Home
content: Welcome to the official website for the Maple Grove Track & Field team.

title: Registration
content:
Learn how to join our team! Registration for the 2026 season is fast approaching.
We will run things the same as we did last year.
Here is the run down.

title: Grades 9-12
content: Registration will open on 2/2/26 at 8 AM.Ulimited registration spots available.Tryouts begins 3/9/26 and end 3/13/24.

title: Grade 8
content: Registration will open on 2/2/26 at 8 AM.Ulimited registration spots available.Tryouts begins 3/12/24 and end 3/13/24.

title: Grade 7
content: Not eligible for registration.

title: All
content:
You must have a physical on file with the activities office to register. Do not email them and ask if you have one on
file. When you register, it will alert you if you do not.

title: How to Register
content: Registration is online through EDUTRAK/SMART SCHOOL.

title: Questions
content: Contact Coach Heaton at heatons@district279.org.

title: Team Information
content: Important documents and resources for the Maple Grove Track & Field team. Some of this information is from the 2025 track & field season. 2025 Maple Grove Track & Field Handbook (PDF) 2026 Maple Grove Track & Field Frequently Asked Questions (PDF)

title: Team Meets
content: Meets scheduled for this season. Meet/Event Calendar

title: April 2, 2026 - Duel Meet
content: Maple Grove and Edina.

title: April 9, 2026 - Dual Meet
content: Maple Grove and St. Michael.

title: April 10, 2026 - Lake Conference Relays
content: All 8 schools' varsity.

title: April 14, 2026 - Duel Meet
content: Maple Grove and Eden Prairie.

title: April 30, 2026 - JV Meet
content: Maple Grove, St. Michael and Buffalo.

title: May 7, 2026 - Lake Conference JV Meet
content: Maple Grove, Wayzata and Edina.

title: May 12, 2026 - Lake Conference Meet (Senior Night)
content: Maple Grove, Wayzata and Edina.

title: Order of Events
content: Standard order of running events for high school track & field meets. 4 x 800m Relay100m Hurdles100m Dash4 x 200m Relay1600m Run4 x 100m Relay400m Dash300m Hurdles800m Run200m Dash3200m Run4 x 400m Relay
